actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the construction of the project for the enlargement of Greenville Harbor, Greenville, Miss.

summary.text: Authorizes the construction of the project for the enlargement of Greenville Harbor in Mississippi, at an estimated Federal cost of $17,600,000. Stipulates that such authorization shall not become effective until approval of the advanced engineering and design memorandum report by the Secretary of the Army and the Chief of Engineers.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the construction of the project for the enlargement of Greenville Harbor, Greenville, Miss.
